songs.title: Scab an Plaster (Demo Version 1)
songs.lyrics:
[Verse 1]
I stepped into a room of clocks
That all told different times
I stepped into a mirrored world
That mirrored all our crimes

[Chorus]
You keep picking at the scab
And I'll keep selling the plaster
Keep telling me that I’m bad
And I keep on getting better faster

[Post-Chorus 1]
You hold me down and you hold me up
You can't communicate
You brought me up just to bring me down
I've nothing left to say

[Verse 2]
I’ve lost, I've lost my innocence
I've found my self-belief
And from a cup of loneliness
I've found instant relief

[Verse 3]
You hold me down, you hold me up
Oh Daddy, are we out of luck?
You brought me up to bring me down
You shut me in, you shut me out

Uh, oh, ah, ah
[Verse 4]
I'm going, I'm going to heaven
I'm going, I'm going to hell
I walk around like a child
Hold my hand out to be held

Chorus
You keep picking at the scab
And I’ll keep selling the plaster
You keep telling me that I’m bad
And I keep on getting better faster

[Post Chorus]
You hold me down and you hold me up
You can't communicate
Brought me up and you bring me down
I’ve nothing left to say
